verses.verse: And Ach'av <S%H256><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> all that Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and withal how he had slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Then Jezebel <S%H348><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> unto Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, So let the 'elohim <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to me, and more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> also, if I make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thy life <S%H5315><s%> as the life <S%H5315><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> of them by to morrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%>.

And when he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that, he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for his life <S%H5315><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, which belongeth to Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and left <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> there.

But he himself went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and sat down <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under a <S%H259><s%> juniper tree <S%H7574><s%>: and he requested <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for himself <S%H5315><s%> that he might die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is enough <S%H7227><s%>; now, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, take away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>; for I am not better <S%H2896><s%> than my fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And as he lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and slept <S%H3462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under a <S%H259><s%> juniper tree <S%H7574><s%>, behold, then an angel <S%H4397><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

And he looked <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and, behold, there was a cake <S%H5692><s%> baken on the coals <S%H7529><s%>, and a cruse <S%H6835><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at his head <S%H4763><s%>. And he did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and laid him down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%>, and touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; because the journey <S%H1870><s%> is too great <S%H7227><s%> for thee.

And he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the strength <S%H3581><s%> of that meat <S%H396><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%> unto Horev <S%H2722><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thither unto a cave <S%H4631><s%>, and lodged <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there; and, behold, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came to him, and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What doest thou here, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have been very <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8763><s%> jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>: for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy covenant <S%H1285><s%>, thrown down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine altars <S%H4196><s%>, and slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and I, even I only, am left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and they seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>, to take it away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the mount <S%H2022><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>. And, behold, the YY <S%H3068><s%> passed by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and a great <S%H1419><s%> and strong <S%H2389><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> rent <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and brake in pieces <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the rocks <S%H5553><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; but the YY <S%H3068><s%> was not in the wind <S%H7307><s%>: and after <S%H310><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> an earthquake <S%H7494><s%>; but the YY <S%H3068><s%> was not in the earthquake <S%H7494><s%>:

And after <S%H310><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%>; but the YY <S%H3068><s%> was not in the fire <S%H784><s%>: and after <S%H310><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> a still <S%H1827><s%> small <S%H1851><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>.

And it was so, when Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, that he wrapped <S%H3874><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> in his mantle <S%H155><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the entering in <S%H6607><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%>. And, behold, there came a voice <S%H6963><s%> unto him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What doest thou here, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have been very <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8763><s%> jealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>: because the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy covenant <S%H1285><s%>, thrown down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine altars <S%H4196><s%>, and slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and I, even I only, am left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and they seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>, to take it away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> on thy way <S%H1870><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>: and when thou comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Hazael <S%H2371><s%> to be king <S%H4428><s%> over Syria <S%H758><s%>:

And Yehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nimshi <S%H5250><s%> shalt thou anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to be king <S%H4428><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and Elisha <S%H477><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> of Hevelmeholah <S%H65><s%> shalt thou anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to be prophet <S%H5030><s%> in thy room.

And it shall come to pass, that him that escapeth <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8737><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of Hazael <S%H2371><s%> shall Yehu <S%H3058><s%> slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: and him that escapeth <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8737><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%> of Yehu <S%H3058><s%> shall Elisha <S%H477><s%> slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

Yet I have left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, all the knees <S%H1290><s%> which have not bowed <S%H3766><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and every mouth <S%H6310><s%> which hath not kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

So he departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thence, and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Elisha <S%H477><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphat <S%H8202><s%>, who was plowing <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen before <S%H6440><s%> him, and he with the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>: and Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his mantle <S%H155><s%> upon him.

And he left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let me, I pray thee, kiss <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> and my mother <S%H517><s%>, and then I will follow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H310><s%> thee. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Go back <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: for what have I done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thee?

And he returned back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from him <S%H310><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and slew <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and boiled <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. Then he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, and ministered <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto him.
